vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UpgradeabilityCampaignStorage._implementation (UpgradeableCampaign.sol#56) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- implementation (UpgradeableCampaign.sol#62-64)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
UpgradeabilityCampaignStorage._implementation should be constant (UpgradeableCampaign.sol#56)
UpgradeabilityCampaignStorage.twoKeyFactory should be constant (UpgradeableCampaign.sol#53)
